extendedInfo.description: Something that started out as a tongue-in-cheek reply to iPhone's Siri, iris. has grown much bigger than being just a Siri clone.Just ask iris. what you want to know. Right from asking how to cope up with your breakup to movie recommendations and questions on science, culture, history etc.********************************************************************************Thanks a ton for getting us 1 million downloads in just two months. We love you.********************************************************************************Note: You need to have "Voice Search" and "TTS library" installed in your phone for iris. to work. Most of the phones have these pre-installed, if not please install them from Android market before you try iris.Features- calender (Remind me of the meeting coming friday)- Alarm (Set alarm at 540 am)- Call someone (can you please call Bob)- text someone (send a text to Bob)- search nearby (find me a nearby coffee shop)- play music (play the song rolling in the deep)- ask movie reviews (should I watch the movie Mission Impossible)- watch videos (show me a video of cat singing)- find news (what is the news about SOPA)and lots and lots more. Discover for yourself.NOTE: New Permissions for voice dialing, texting, searching and contacts look up

reviews.title: Good attempt
reviews.comment: It is a great so with phenomenal potential it needs to be a little more versatile
reviews.author: Karthik Rajah

reviews.title: Not kid appropriate
reviews.comment: Asked for a joke, received one with the F-bomb included. When I ask about a zip code,  I get  a geography lesson on a Swiss town. Huh?
reviews.author: Will Ceron

reviews.title: What happened?
reviews.comment: Can no longer access settings! Iris only will listen for half a second and tells me she couldn\'t understand! Help! Setting option takes me to Friday settings
reviews.author: Tony Seals

reviews.title: Developers fix it on ascend p1
reviews.comment: Give wrong answers..do not make calls and do not even tell whether location ...please fix it developers.
reviews.author: vinay khanna

reviews.title: This app still needs a little more work
reviews.comment: Good, not great, Siri for the iPhone is still a little better. This one is on its way to be a great app.
reviews.author: Shane O\'Connor

reviews.title: I really enjoy iris.
reviews.comment: Iris can be funny somtimes I really like her.
reviews.author: Yuki Masahiko

reviews.title: A worthy companion
reviews.comment: So far she\'s pretty awesome. She isn\'t afraid to speak her mind lol
reviews.author: ChimiChain

reviews.title: I like this app but...
reviews.comment: Iris it\'s cool but needs improvements. Command functions are limited and it needs to understand more.  I asked how hot it is outside and Iris asked back if it was a joke. Make Iris smarter. Make Iris learn everything from the Internet.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Needs more work, But 3/5  for now
reviews.comment: Great app. It could use much more fine tuning but it has great potential. And also some of my questions gave me an answer like something involving metres...possibly a bug?
reviews.author: May Pinnock

reviews.title: Confusing...
reviews.comment: Is it human or software? If it is human then siri is better. If it is software then allow swearing. Google now is almost better, at least as or more equal.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Its very good apps.
reviews.comment: Its very nice app. Use it
reviews.author: Rangwala Murtaza

reviews.title: So - so ... yet !
reviews.comment: It has a tendency to repeat answers to questions it cannot comprehend. Also missing is a conversational style of Q & A.
reviews.author: Nipun Sahrawat

reviews.title: Fabulous
reviews.comment: its not exactly like siri but its pretty awesome its smart and has a sense of humor
reviews.author: Sunny Ross

reviews.title: Great laugh
reviews.comment: Love the sarcasm. Have fun with this app. Better than a magic eight ball.
reviews.author: Stacey Cangelosi

reviews.title: Its okay
reviews.comment: So far not really any different from any of the other similar apps I found. Although the Speech is better than most.
reviews.author: Eric Shappie

reviews.title: Fun toy but needs work
reviews.comment: It is good at telling jokes, and getting it to call someone,  but she can\'t perform even simple tasks.  Here are examples:   \"wake me up in one hour\" \'shall I seriously the alarm for 12:29pm?\' (no iris,  it\'s currently 8am...)  \"What\'s the weather now?\"  \'Grand Island, NY,  66F......\' (wait,  what?  Where the heck is grand island...  let\'s try again. ) \"what\'s the weather now in Toronto? \" \'I am in a cold dark room, placed inside a dark cabinet blah blah blah\'  At best,  it got me weather in Toronto, Ohio.
reviews.author: Novina W

reviews.title: Well it tells jokes
reviews.comment: So, pretty much any question I ask or any action outside of saying \'joke\', is answered either by explaining what a cheeseburger is, or, informing me I\'m rude and violating cha cha rules or what ever. But, I have to say, it does know a few funny jokes so for that I give 2 stars.
reviews.author: Maegun Barton

reviews.comment: Pretty good, can almost take over the world with it-looking forward to the next generstion
reviews.author: James Kelly

reviews.comment: Iris has answered every question I\'ve asked perfectly.  She even has a sense of humor. I love this app!
reviews.author: Patti Lewis

reviews.title: Problems
reviews.comment: No widgets?! Gimme a button for my home screen guys!  Also,  can\'t update Facebook. Some issue with authentication.
reviews.author: King Antonius
